name: Duckgeon
description:
How to play
  • Use the sword to damage your enemies
  • Use the sword to reflect the projectiles
  • Survive each room to earn an upgrade
Controls Input Action Left mouse button Swing the sword WASD Move

The web and updated version have minor changes compared to the initial version.

  • Now the game has an end room
  • Some bugs with the audio were fixed
  • Bigger rooms and the enemies spawn after some delay not once you're in the room
